mapper.select: select * from reply_t where item_no = #{item_no} order by reply_group desc, reply_step asc
mapper.insert: insert into reply_t (reply_no, item_no, reply_con, id, reply_date, reply_group, reply_step) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{item_no},#{reply_con},#{id}, sysdate, reply_seq.currval, 1)

insert into reply_t (reply_no, item_no, reply_con, id, reply_date, reply_group, reply_step, reply_level) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{item_no},#{reply_con},#{id}, sysdate, #{reply_group}, #{reply_step}+1, #{reply_level}+1)
mapper.select: select count(item_no) from reply_t where item_no =#{item_no}
select item_no from reply_t where reply_no = #{reply_no}
select count(reply_con) from reply_t where reply_level = 0
select * from (select a.*, rownum as rnum from (reply_t)a where rownum<= #{strNum}+14 and reply_con is not null and reply_level = 0)a where rnum>=#{strNum} order by rnum asc
select * from reply_t where reply_level > 0 and reply_group = #{reply_group} order by reply_step
